gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਦੀਪ ਜੋਤ ਹੋਤ ਨਾਹਿਤ ਮਲੀਨ ਅਾਲੀ ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਨਾਂਹਿ ਸਿਹਜਾ ਕੁਸਮ ਕੁਮਲਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jau Lau Deep Jot Hot Naahit Maleen Aalee , Jau Lau Naanhi Sihajaa Kousam Koumalaat Hai ?
translation: O friend! before dawn when the light of a lamp goes dim and the flowers on the decorated nuptial bed have not yet withered away,

gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਨ ਕਮਲਨ ਪ੍ਰਫੁਲਤ ੳੁਡਤ ਅਲ ਬਿਰਖ ਬਿਹੰਗਮ ਨ ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਚੁਹਚੁਹਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jau Lau N Kamalan Pradhulat Udat Ala , Birakh Bihangam N Jau Lau Chuhachuhaat Hai ?
translation: Before the sunrise till the flowers bloom and the bumble bees are not attracted to them and before the dawn when the birds on the tree have not yet started chirping;

gurmukhi: ਜੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਭਾਸਕਰ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ ਨ ਅਕਾਸ ਬਿਖੈ ਤਮਚੁਰ ਸੰਖ ਨਾਦ ਸਬਦ ਨ ਪ੍ਰਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jau Lau Bhaasakar Ko Prakaas N Akaas Bikhai , Tamachur Sankh Naad Sabad N Praat Hai ?
translation: Till such time, the Sun shines in the sky and the crowing of the cock and the sound of the conch blowing is not heard,

gurmukhi: ਤੳੁ ਲੳੁ ਕਾਮ ਕੇਲ ਕਾਮਨਾ ਸਕੂਲ ਪੂਰਨ ਕੈ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਿਹਕਾਮ ਪ੍ਰਿਯ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਨੇਮ ਘਾਤ ਹੈ ॥੬੬੧॥
transliteration: Tau Lau Kaam Kayl Kaamanaa Sakool Pooran Kai , Hoi Nihakaam Priy Praym Naym Ghaat Hai ?661?
translation: Till then, free from all worldly desires and in complete pleasure, you should remain engrossed in the bliss of union with the Lord. This is the time to fulfill the tradition of love with your beloved Lord. (Taking initiation from the True Guru, this is th
